title: I just lost a game because a wasp flew on my head, and it was mid team fight
body:
And I bolted

And I just spent 2 hours and 39 minutes tracking down, cornering, and killing this wasp

To all of you wasps out there, if you come into my house, and disrupt my league games again

I will track you down, I will find you, and I will kill you.

Upvote for clarity so other wasps can see.

http://gph.is/15RWFHy
http://gph.is/2cRnnvz

replies.body: I guess your team really got bee hind once you left.
if only they stalled, could of hive a chance

In no universe does 'hive' replace 'had'.

What is wrong with you that you can't even manage to make bee puns?

I didn't mean to bee such a buzz kill, I just wanted to bee a part of this and bumbled everything up. I don't mean to drone on, but the venom in your words really sting, next time I'll wax over my ideas before harvesting the honey pot.

This totally makes up for the mangled grammar <3

(but yeah, "could hive had a chance" :P )
This is what bothers you? Not the fact he used OF instead of HAVE (or 'VE in this case)?

> [{quoted}](name=Azir Chroma,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=2HqUpteK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-24T20:12:45.398+0000)
>
> I guess your team really got bee hind once you left.

I just lost some brains cells.
http://gph.is/1ks0k6D
RIP YELLOW CHROMA KHA'ZIX.
http://www.skepticmoney.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/wasps-white-anglo-saxon-protestants-wasps-republican-fascist-political-poster-1269665689-220x174.jpg
http://www.techthisoutnews.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/squinting.jpg

http://www.politifake.org/image/political/1003/wasps-white-anglo-saxon-protestants-wasps-republican-fascist-political-poster-1269665689.jpg

Still need to click on it tho
I lost a game because I blinked during a teamfight.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cwdbLu_x0gY
That would be me.
How slow do you blink

Like most people. When I opened my eyes, I saw:
{{champion:107}} PENTAKILL

Also, it's "How slowly do you blink?"
{{summoner:4}} ?
The entire bee movie but every time they say bee a wasp flies onto your forehead.

"You like Jazz?"

*Gets stung*
There's no bee in that part.
He didn't mention about getting stung.

YOU chose to stop playing the game to stare at a wasp?

Downvoting.

> submitted about 4 hours ago in Memes & Games

Oh

> **in Memes & Games**

What's

> # Memes & Games

This
he's gonna Need some {{summoner:1}}  for that {{summoner:11}}

He's gonna need some {{summoner:3}} for that {{summoner:12}} 
Am I doing this right?
More like {{item:3694}} for that {{item:3632}}.
More like {{item:3056}} for that {{item:3637}}
wtf are those :O
When a meme hits hot and the gameplay kids think its a Yasuo thread

You know that meme where the guy playing a game ignores the girl who has her legs spread and panties down on the bed?

Yeah, that's not how it works in real life. My wife did it to me, and I immediately lost my ranked match. 

You know the worst part? I didn't even get any that day.

Last week I lost a game because the pizza delivery guy called me he's almost here, so I ran out of the hause to take the pizza and be back in a minute before I cause some inconvenience. **That idiot missed my hause two times with me standing right in front of it.**
You really shouldn't start a game if youre expcting someone at your door. Jut wait for the guy to bring the food, then start one.
They said 90 minutes, not my fault if they arrive THIS sooner

90 minutes?!?!

What the fuck kind of pizza is it? That shit better be fused with dragon meat or something.

I guess they say that so if they were late I couldn't complain
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

"90 minutes or it's free? EXCELLENT, HAH HAH HAH HAHA HAHA-"

*Ding dong*

"Oh, you're early."
so what happens if you see yellow jacket shen? do the wasp start take over you mind with their hive mind powers?

#SaveTheBees

#KillTheWasps

Wasps are like that crazy ex-girlfriend who thinks you want her back but you don't but still pursues you anyways.
Nerf wasps. Butterflies need a buff.
no it wasp your own fault

It was sent by the enemy team.
Report for cheating.
Another form of DDos.
A few months ago I had issues with yellowjackets constantly coming through the AC vent in my room, I elected not to play ranked for the time being.
You can lure wasps and flies out of your place with light. Its especially easy if you live in a flat.
Once a stinkbug was crawling up my pants.... I took it until I knew my team was gucci.
I lost an hour long ranked match as mf once due to my cat jumping on my keyboard and making me flash ult the complete opposite direction of the enemy team Feelsbadman
that's some next level bad luck.
They really should put a wasp as a champ in the game. Or any other insect.
